name: Redemption (itch) (nb.fitzgerald)
description:
A bit about Redemption

Redemption is a 2D side scroller. You play as a young angel who has just broken an important artifact in heaven. To gain redemption, you must collect all of the pieces of the broken artifact otherwise risk becoming a fallen angel. As with anything, flying takes up energy so you must maintain your energy levels to keep flying.

Key features
  • 2D art style
  • Two styles of play - flying horizontally and falling vertically
  • Collect energy and dark energy to maintain energy
  • Short play sessions
  • Play strategically to achieve the challenges

Release date: 26/06/2015

Platform: Windows

Price: Free
